subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Also written as {{och-l|率|to lead}}; both represent the ''s''-causative of {{och-l|律|to follow}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྲིད||commander, leader}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{sense|handsome}} {{zh-l|英俊}}, {{zh-l|帥氣}}; {{q|Min Nan}} {{zh-l|緣投}} {{zh-l|燦才}}, {{zh-l|燦頭}}
